name: D1.1 –  Signed off before work completion

T1-1 – Technical data was not available in the vicinity of the work area

F1.1 Maintenance work carried out without adequate protection from noise distraction.
F2.1 Maintenance work carried out without adequate protection from weather elements.
F2.2 - Storage of aircraft components / parts / materials / tools / equipment in accordance to manufacturer’s requirement was not humidity / temperature controlled.
F3.1 -  Inadequate lighting to ensure each inspection and maintenance task can be carried out in an effective manner.
F4.1 – Good housekeeping of the work area was not maintained.
F4.2 - Containers for disposal of rubbish / debris were not cleared regularly.
F4.3 Slippery / wet floor was not cleaned / covered with approved absorbent materials.
F4.4 – The requirement for parts storage racks to keep out dust and other contaminants to a minimum was not complied.
F4.5 – Inappropriate / Insufficient storage racks for holding aircraft parts / materials / tools / equipment.
F4.6 – Storage rack ESDS mats were not available or properly maintained.
F5.1 – Waste solvent / fuel / oil drum was not closed.
F5.2 – Waste solvent / fuel / oil drum was overflowing.
F5.3 - Waste solvent / fuel / oil was disposed / drained into incorrect waste container.
F1.6 - Electrical power conduit, cable or outlet was damaged.
F6.2 – Water tap in hangar found leaking.
F6.3 – Compressed air outlets found leaking / gauge corroded.
F6.4 – Aircraft grounding point was unserviceable or servicing date overdue
F6.5 – Building ground point servicing date overdue.

F7.6 – Access to the fire extinguisher / fire hose reel was obstructed

F1.9.1 – Electrical equipment not inspected by qualified person. Note:- 6 Monthly - Category A equipment are portable electrical equipment used frequently in the Hangars, flight line and apron. - Yearly - Category B equipment are portable electrical equipment that are used in workshop environment. - For dual use equipment that may also be used in the Hangar/apron, they should be classified as Cat A.
F1.9.2 – Electrical equipment with damaged plugs/sockets/cables.
F1.9.3 – Cables are placed on wet area.
F1.9.4 – PowerPoints found overloaded.
F1.9.5 – Electrical equipment found with no Safety Mark logo.
F1.9.6 – Safety guard missing and/or not available.
F1.9.7 – Emergency Stop switch missing and/or not available.
F1.9.8 – Lockout/Tag not in placed during maintenance, inspection and repair of equipment.
F1.10.1 – Passageways, walkway and emergency escape routes are cluttered or blocked.
F1.10.2 – Components and materials are stored or stacked in an unsafe manner.
F1.10.3 – Poor cleanliness of the area (e.g. scraps, flammable materials not removed etc.).
F1.11.1 – Hot work permit not approved and/or displayed prior to start of any hot work.
F1.11.2 – Incompatible works carried out simultaneously.
F1.11.3 – Fire fighting equipment or attendant not available on site.
F1.11.4 – Combustible material found near hot work area.

Employees not equipped with appropriate work at height equipment/PPE.

F1.12.5 – Work at height equipment/PPE found defective.
F1.12.6 – Work at height equipment/PPE not maintained.
F1.12.7 – Open side above 2 metres not guarded.
F1.12.8 – Guard rails not available and/or fully extended.
F1.12.9 – Wrong type of work-stand being used.
F1.13.1 – Lifting plan not available and/or catered to that particular environment.
F1.13.2 – Lifting permit not approved and/or available for mobile crane operations.
F1.13.3 – Statutory lifting equipment found expired and/or with no proper records.
F1.13.4 – Employees are trained and/or authorized to overhead crane.
F1.13.5 – Lifting team (Lifting supervisor/rigger/signalman) not qualified and/or authorized.
F1.13.6 – Safe working load not conspicuously marked on all lifting equipment.
F1.13.7 – Lifting equipment not maintained and or defective.
F1.14.1 – Confined space entry permit not approved and/or displayed.
F1.14.2 – Air test not conducted and/or by qualified confined space safety assessor.
F1.14.3 – Employee not trained to work in confined space.
F1.14.4 – Attendant not assigned and available on site.
F1.14.5 – Incompatible equipment / tool are used for confined space works.
F1.14.6 – Employee not aware of confined space emergency procedure.
F1.15.1 – “Safe Working Load” not marked on work stands / platforms.
F1.15.2 – Work-stands steps not according to guidelines (step riser: 6.5” to 10”, tread: ≥7)
F1.15.3 – Gap between work-stand/platform and aircraft >300mm.
F1.15.4 – Wing dock openings not barricaded / covered / cordoned off.
F1.15.5 – Work-stands/Platform not maintained and/or defective.
F1.16.1 – Empty and full cylinders are not labelled and/or stored separately.
F1.16.2 – Valve protection caps not installed on cylinders.
F1.16.3 – Flashback arrestors and non-return valves not installed on flammable gas cylinder.
F1.16.4 – Gas cylinders not stored properly and/or secured to prevent tipping over.
F1.16.5 – Heat sources found near gas cylinder storage area.
F1.16.6 – In use gas cylinder found without pressure regulators.
F1.16.7 – Gas cylinder hose not secured.
F1.16.8 – Gas cylinder accessories (hose/regulator/clamp) in deteriorated condition.
F1.17.1 – Air compressors not equipped with pressure relief valves, and pressure gauges.
F1.17.2 – Appropriate PPEs not worn when using compressed air?
F1.17.3 – Air compressor accessories (hose/regulator/clamp) in deteriorated condition.
F1.18.1 – Employee not using safe manual handling techniques or team lifting techniques.
F1.18.2 – Mechanical handling equipment not maintained and/or defective.
F1.18.3 – Large & heavy loads stored in hazardous position.
F1.18.4 – Employee carrying load exceeding the maximum weight of 25 kg alone.
F1.18.5 – Employees performing repetitive motion task
F1.18.6 – Employees performing task in awkward posture.
F1.19.1 – Ionization radiation equipment (X-ray) without license from NEA.
F1.19.1 – Mandatory warning signs available at work area.

F1.19.5 – Radiation survey meter not calibrated.
F1.19.6 – Shields not provided against radiation exposure.
F1.19.7 – Radiation worker found without a Thermo Luminescence Dosimeters (TLD) badge.
F1.19.8 – Non-ionization radiation (Class 3B & above laser and ultrasonic apparatus) equipment without license from NEA.
F1.19.9 – Appropriate PPEs are worn when handling non-ionization  (Class 3B & above laser and ultrasonic apparatus) radiation equipment
